attributes.action: A Public Oath for Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details: All Members of Parliament to take a public oath when first elected, and at the start of each Parliamentary session, pledging to act for the benefit of all the people of Britain, to do nothing in their parliamentary activities for personal or corporate gain, to act with honestly and integrity at all times, and to do everything within their power to make Britain a better country for every inhabitant.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House (Parliament)
